wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Moss (born 1 June 1985) is an English actor. He is known for portraying the role of Rhys Ashworth in the Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks from 2005 to 2014. He also appeared in the BBC soap opera Doctors as Paul Cuthbert. On stage, he played the role of Sam Wheat in the National tour of Ghost the Musical.
